column5: You do a great job and the passion is apparent in your vids. The drone footage is awesome! Have fun, and enjoy the Mavic!

Hi all, Learning to fly my new Mavic Pro drone, steep learning curve but I am so thrilled with the initial results. Finally I feel like I can capture on film what I can only describe as my passion, and hopefully share what makes me feel ALIVE! Hope this gets the juices flowing for everyone who is coming up this year!DRONE FOOTAGE VIDEO OF LAKE WABIGOONhttps://youtu.be/Ptp23sjI60M
Nice video! Do you watch any of Aaron Wiebe's Uncut Angling videos he started using drone footage about a year ago, he does some pretty neat stuff.
I hate that show....it makes me too jealous....lol.
Nice!! A few years ago you would have needed a camera crew and helicopter to get footage like that.
Nice perspective Simon. Thanks for sharing. In another one of your videos, it was painful just watching you tear that hook out of your thumb!
Great video! Can't wait to be out there on a day like that!
Thanks, Simon. Consider the juices flowing strong. Hope the hand has healed. Hooks
Love drone footage. Keep it coming! Would love to do that myself, but the fear of crashing it into water is real......

Would love to get started with this technology. What type of gear are you using? Standing on the ground can you see what the drone sees? Battery life? How much footage can be stored on the drone? Thanks
These drone videos of Amik's outpost are pretty awesome:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HBFWP5GKSWYhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VKhuMoJHdng
